channel.title: Tools on Light GraphQL 4J - A GraphQL framework built on top of light-4j
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Light GraphQL 4J - A GraphQL framework built on top of light-4j

item.title: Tools
item.description: The most useful tool is the GraphiQL application that is served at http://localhost:8080/graphql For more information about this tool, please check this site.
